articles.title: HSBC’s top executives prepare move to Asia after announcement of 2020 earnings - Livemint
articles.description: The coming reset comes just 12 months after an overhaul that called for cutting 35,000 jobs, about 15% of the total, over three years. But Chairman Mark Tucker told the Asian Financial Forum conference in January that the pandemic has upended those plans
articles.content: HSBC Holdings Plc is considering the return of some global leaders to the banks original hometown, reinforcing Asias role as its center of gravity.A cadre of senior executives is set to relocate in c… [+4575 chars]
